getTypeArgument

getTypeArguments

public static Map<String,Type> getTypeArguments(Class<?> genericType,
                                                Object obj)
Try to find the instantiation of all of genericTypes type parameters in objs class.

Parameters:
genericType - the generic supertype of objs class
obj - an instantiation of a subclass of genericType. All of genericTypes type parameters must have been instantiated in the inheritance hierarchy.
Returns:
a map of genericTypes type parameters (their name in the source code) to the type they are instantiated as in obj
